About

I am a PhD student at TU Delft doing research on conversational search under the supervision of Claudia Hauff. I have BSc and MSc degrees from the Department of Computer Science (DCC) of (UFMG) - under the supervision of Rodrygo Santos. In industry I have worked with machine learning and data science projects for about 3 years at Hekima both leading and developing. Follow me on Twitter.
